ValidationRule.description: Only depot team, Application support and in Sales Support can move orders to other status past unplanned.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Status) , ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status) ,'Unplanned'), ($Permission.UpdateOrderStatusPastUnplanned == FALSE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Do not have permission to move Status past Unplanned
